RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Start Recording On Note Input
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: "Start Recording On Note Input" or "STN" starts recording notes from the first input note with follow the player's position in the pattern. It will start recording from the selected line. - Go to "Renoise/Options:~ Start Recording On Note Input" to enable/disable it.
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: ulneiz
